content: It's happening! The International Centre for Mathematical Sciences, in Edinburgh, is soliciting proposals for workshops on the general theme of Mathematics for Humanity. I'm on the scientific committee who will help evaluate proposals.

There are three main themes:

A. Integrating the global research community

B. Mathematical challenges for humanity

C. Global history of mathematics

If you click on the first link you'll get an overview of the whole thing, while the other links describe the three themes.

The first round of proposals are due April 15, 2023. Ask me if you have any questions, and tell me if there's anyone I should contact - someone who could organize a workshop.
